courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: A deep dive into advanced piano techniques, including arpeggios, improvisation, and sight-reading.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand music theory concepts such as scales, chords, progressions, and key signatures.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: A step-by-step guide to drumming techniques, rhythms, and patterns for new drummers.

courses.title: Vocal Training & Singing Techniques
courses.description: Improve your vocal skills with exercises on breathing, pitch control, and performance techniques.
